coreAttributes.name: beer-bitch token
coreAttributes.description: A token which was given to you by Oglix upon purchase of a pint of beer. Collecting five of these tokens allows you to trade them in for a fuck of Oglix's beer-bitch.

effectTooltipLines.line: Exchanged for a fuck of a beer-bitch at the bar in the tavern, 'The Crossed Blades'

coreAttributes.applyEffects: This token is nothing more than a bottle cap that's been painted green and then crudely stamped with an 'O' marking. Remembering what Oglix told you, five of these tokens can be traded in for a fuck of the beer-bitch behind her bar.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the beer-bitch token...
